about_the_game:
Meet the only DLC content that can make the original BoneTown look tame: the BoneTown Kinks DLC.

With the Kinks DLC, experience all new types of sex. Kinks like threesomes, gangbangs, creampies, futa, BDSM, and pregnant are only the beginning. For the first time ever, players can also enjoy BoneTown in Gay or Lesbian Mode. And last but not least, there are a chunk of new straight sex positions, character customizers, and more.



The new Threesome Mode allows you to pick up two people at once, and have sex with both of them. Have you dreamed of a threesome with a sorority girl and a stoner? How about a party girl and a punk? The choices are endless.



Play the entire game as a lesbian. When Lesbian Mode is turned on, you will use only your customizable lesbian avatar during sex, because sometimes all you want is girls girls girls.



Gay Mode allows you to bone the boys running around BoneTown. When activated, gay guys will appear around the world and if your balls are big enough, they’re all yours.



Four new Gangbang sex positions will allow you to bone a girl with your best bud. Any girl you pick up can now be tag-teamed with these 4 new sex positions: Gangbang Dicksuck, Split the Silk, Threeway, and the Wobbly H.



Tired of watching girls do each other with dildos or straps? Turn on Futa Mode and chicks with dicks will appear around the world, giving a whole new dimension to lesbian sex.



The new Creampie Mode will allow you to change the orgasm of five existing sex positions to a Creampie orgasm. Watch any girl in the game squeeze back out what you gave her.



Gain access to five new BDSM sex positions that can be used on any girl in the game, and push BoneTown’s sexual boundaries even more with restraints and smacking around that did not previously exist in the game. Get your BDSM on in these new positions: Fingering, Dicksuck, Froggy, Doggy, and Pegging.



Bi-Sexual positions allow you to have a threesome with a guy and a girl at the same time.



Explore and compete in a gym turned night club that is full of nothing but Big Beautiful Women.



Turn on Pregnant mode and have hot mamas-to-be turn up all over the game for your personal enjoyment.



Now when you strip down a girl in BoneTown, you have a chance of finding a sexy surprise: some girls are now wearing racy lingerie under their outfits.



Gain access to nine new straight sex positions: Hand-job, Titty Fuck, Foot-job, Ass-licking, Fisting, Solo Dildo Butt, Reverse Cowgirl, Tabletop Sex, and Spooning.



On top of the four threesome sex positions already available in the game (Scissoring, Dildo-ing, Against the Wall, and Doggy), there will now be four new ones: the Train, Face and Cock Ride, Side by Side, and Side by Side Anal.



On top of the four lesbian sex positions already in the game, unlock five new lesbian sex positions to use in Lesbian Mode or in Threesomes: Dildoing Butts, Sucking Strap-ons, Fisting, Missionary, and Anal Pile-driver.



Four new Gay sex positions allow the player to get down with the boys: Dick Suck, Missionary, Against the Wall, and Doggy. Plus, to make it more fun, in each position you can choose whether you want to be the pitcher or the catcher.



Eight new interior levels are the hubs for the new kinks:

  • Cream of the Crop Creampie Shop
  • The Bearded Clam Lesbian Bar
  • Five Dudes - Gangbangs and Burgers
  • Chicks w/ Dicks Fried Chicken and Fill ‘Er Up Gas Station
  • Planet Fill This Gym
  • The Broken Spoke Gay Bar
  • Bone U. Medical Center Hospital
  • The Gore House BDSM Club



15 new Competitions will not only highlight all the new kinks, but also unlock some of the new sexual positions.



With the new interiors come 6 new character types: Transitioning Lesbians, Bear Gay Guys, Futa girls, Gym People, Pregnant Girls and BDSM Participants.



The Kinks DLC is first time we’ve exposed all the clothing, voices, hair, body sizes, lingerie, dicks, and everything else that makes up our characters in single, easy to use places. But . . . this is a video game, so gaining access to all that great content’s got to be earned. You’ll unlock more options in each one of these customizers by completing the original game’s story-line as well as the new Kinks competitions.



Make your main character just how you want him. A stoner blinged out in gangster attire? A crackhead in a business suit with his dick hanging out? We don’t judge, it’s up to you.



This is the place where you can go wild crafting the girl who’s just right for you. A black girl who sounds like she’s Asian? A schoolgirl trapped in a BDSM body? The heart desires what the heart desires.



Create the gay lover of your dreams and then bone him. From bears to twinks and everything in between, we got what you’re looking for.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Kinks DLC includes explicit sexual acts between men and women, men and men, and women and women. There are sexual acts involving one man and two women, as well as two women and one man. We have sexual acts involving women at different stage of transitioning to men, including women with penises.  In this DLC, different parts of the girls body are used to perform sexual acts, such as their breasts and feet. In this game you are able to perform sexual acts with pregnant women. This DLC has sexual acts where both men and women are sticking different things such as dildos or their hands inside the girls vagina. There is also an option in this DLC for  the player to view the man's ejaculate coming back out of the woman's vagina. This DLC contains sexual acts where one of the partners is consensually restrained and slapped.

There is no sexual acts performed in this DLC that are non-consensually, all the sex is fully consensual.
